A

AcaciaTree - Class in resources
A variety of tree with the name "Acacia".
AcaciaTree() - Constructor for class resources.AcaciaTree
Create a new tree with the name "Acacia".
ActionsLog - Class in logs
Log system to record different Strings about the actions realized by the player or the npcs.
The main attribute of the ActionsLog object is a string (log) when the method registerAction(text) concatenate more text.
Whit method toString() we read the log.
ActionsLog() - Constructor for class logs.ActionsLog
Create a new empty action log.
actualCitizenInfoText - Variable in class main.graphicLauncher
 
actualMoney() - Method in class main.CitizenList
This method is used on the createX(board) methods to determine how much money have the new citizens.
addAllCitizensToMap(Board) - Method in class main.CitizenList
This method read all the citizenList and add, in random valid positions, the citizens to the map.
Important: This method add all the citizens to the map.
addBeginning(Object) - Method in class utils.ObjectsList
Create a new array with one more length, add the new object to the 0 index and copy the actual array as from the next index.
addEnd(Object) - Method in class utils.ObjectsList
Increase in one the length of the list and add the item at the end.
addGenericResource(Object) - Method in class main.ResourcesList
This method add one object at the end of the resourceList.
addGoldOreMineral(int) - Method in class main.ResourcesList
This method created 'x' GoldOreMineral objects and adds them to the end of the resourceList.
addLastCitizen(Board) - Method in class main.CitizenList
This method add the last citizen of the citizenList to a random valid position of the board.
addMoney(Money) - Method in class base.Man
This method read a Money object and add the money to the money of this man.
Important: This method does not subtract money of the object that is passed as input parameter.
addOnIndex(Object, int) - Method in class utils.ObjectsList
Create a new array with one more length that are a copy of the actual array.
addResourcesToMap(Board) - Method in class main.ResourcesList
This method run over all the resourceList and add all the objects inside the list in randoms valid positions of one map.
addSomething(Object, int, int) - Method in class map.Board
Add one object to the indicated position.
addToInventory(Object) - Method in class main.Inventory
This method add a object at the end of the inventory.
Alcalde - Class in unused
Unused for now.
Alcalde() - Constructor for class unused.Alcalde
 
AlderTree - Class in resources
A variety of tree with the name "Alder".
AlderTree() - Constructor for class resources.AlderTree
Create a new tree with the name "Alder".
aleatoricMoney() - Method in class main.CitizenList
This method is used in actualMoney() to create new citizens with random amount of money between 1 and 100.
AleatoricName - Class in utils
This class generate aleatoric names between different ranges for the min and max lenght.
The generated names are 'alien' or 'esoteric' like.
AleatoricName() - Constructor for class utils.AleatoricName
Generate a random name with length between 3 and 12.
AleatoricName(int, int) - Constructor for class utils.AleatoricName
Generate a random name with personalized lengths.
The values includes the possible appaerance of spaces.
Alguacil - Class in unused
Unused for now.
Alguacil() - Constructor for class unused.Alguacil
 
Animal - Class in base
Base object to create animals Each animal have a different name, type and icon
Animal(String, String, String) - Constructor for class base.Animal
Create a new Animal object.
AspenTree - Class in resources
A variety of tree with the name "Aspen".
AspenTree() - Constructor for class resources.AspenTree
Create a new tree with the name "Aspen".
